Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, so I'm doing some research into people's habits and technology obsessions around music. This is all for a start-up company my friend and I, who are both HUGE KSP fans, want to get going out of college. Your feedback and help would be greatly appreciated! If you could take our survey we'd really love it, only 8 questions. If you have any questions or comments regarding our business venture just post away!

- Hazard1556

Survey Link: https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/W2WKRXL
